description: I always try to center the niche on walls, I’m not a fan of offset or corner niches but understand the utility. Also, this is a mitered niche. As such, I build it slightly bigger than necessary. This makes it easier to connect the miter joints. Our Gold and Platinum members have access to this full start-to-finish tile shower video series at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tile #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: Useful Shower Niche Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
